channel.title: Open Source on Bluepie's Journal
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source on Bluepie's Journal

item.title: Open Source Dnd Email Editor
item.description: I created a drag and drop email editor, I’ve been working on it for the past month. It’s a lot of fun to work on, I completed it for first release, I’ll shed some light on the challenges I faced and how I solved them. Why’s & What’s why build this? No free editors/open source editors that does the job, but why not profit? Not interested, I believe in Open Source.
